thread.title: Global Guardian Opens New Global Headquarters In McLean, VA
thread.title_full: Global Guardian Opens New Global Headquarters In McLean, VA

author: admin
title: Global Guardian Opens New Global Headquarters In McLean, VA
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/6/2015 @ 3:00 AM   Global Guardian 
MCLEAN, Va., Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Global Guardian, a leader in global security solutions, is proud to announce the opening of its new global headquarters 8280 Greensboro Drive, McLean, Virginia. The state of the art facility includes a new, custom designed 24-hour Operational Center to better serve clients as they travel. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20141130/161411LOGO 
The move is in a response to growing client demand the need to accommodate additional staff. 
"Global Guardian is dedicated to providing its clients the best security solutions available in the market today. Our new headquarters helps us better achieve that goal by giving our Operations Center team greatly expanded capabilities to support travelers and assist them in the event of emergencies," said Dale Buckner, President & CEO of Global Guardian 
About Global Guardian 
Global Guardian is a McLean, VA based international security firm that provides its clients with access to a comprehensive suite of security services. Its capabilities include personnel tracking supported by a dedicated 24-hour Operation Center, a full range of personnel based security and executive protection services, medical support and transportation, travel intelligence and emergency response and evacuation services in over 40 markets globally. Global Guardian's suite of risk mitigation services provides organizations with innovative and cost-effective solutions to help them protect their staff and business operations around the world.
